entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] CI improvements to improve test coverage, and reduce load #74538
  • NET-6 - Error on loading default value of My.Settings #74528
    Future
  • [Analyzer] Adjust/simplify code for numeric IntPtr #74518
    Future
  • Can we make HttpClientFactory as purely configuration API? #74508
  • [wasm] Size regression #74506
    8.0.0
  • Add source-build leg to llvm-project #74505
  • Don't native build for the app cause missing meta exception #74503
  • Question: Offline self contained publish, what nuget packages? #74497
  • Binary Xml format broken on big-endian machines #74494
    7.0.0
  • Expose instance methods in JsonSerializer #74492
    8.0.0
  • Complete support for containment of memory operands under casts #74490
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convenient integers reading #74489
  • System.Data.OleDb.Test - timeout and hangs #74488
  • [wasm-ep] Wasm.Browser.EventPipe.Sample fails #74487
    8.0.0
  • Add ProcessInfo3 diagnostic IPC command to include libc type or equivalent #74476
    8.0.0
  • NonBacktracking treats timeout check boundaries as end-of-input for anchors #74467

Closed

  • Crash/memory corruption when converting `Int128` to string #74486
    7.0.0
  • Local test run experience is systematically degrading #11030
    Future
  • runtest.py doesn't handle both ambient and test_env COMPlus variables #12364
    Future
  • Default out filename of crossgen is confusing #7746
    Future
  • unable to "dotnet restore" to use my own build of coreclr #11137
    Future
  • Explore allowing a command-line parameter to control CORE_LIBRARIES in corerun #7112
    Future
  • Unable to bind dictionary with int key type from appsettings.json to options class #36044
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Drawing.Graphics:GetContextInfo(byref,bool,byref):this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74126
    7.0.0
  • Namespace System.Numerics.Generic - IEEE 754 and custom number types #74475
  • Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #73858
    7.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Runtime crash in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #71080
    Future
  • ApiCompat failures when building runtime #74474
    Future
  • [NativeAot] List<T> in options pattern not work in nativeaot mode #74436
  • Provide a public api to "lock" a `JsonSerializerOptions` #54482
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] ubuntu 18.04/x64 : Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> on 8/18/2022 3:00:51 AM #74437
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown. #74292
  • [Perf] Windows 10.0.25094/arm64 : Regression on 8/11/2022 10:02:44 AM #74440
    7.0.0
  • Implement proper UInt64 and Int64 marshaling in the WASM bindings #61404
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Timeout: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #73776
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: Marshalling of type object is not implemented - Constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: OleTxFixture fixture #74187
  • Test failure : System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Tests.Atom10ItemFormatterTests.WriteTo_EmptyItem_SerializesExpected #47886
  • Test failure MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.CountersTest.Basic_Counters #53261
  • Test failure MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTest.Trim(throwOnDisposed: null) #62828
  • [NativeAOT][Publish Error]One or more errors occurred. #74477
  • Native building project with Microsoft Identity included, failing on System.Net.Quic #74380

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74539
  • [IGNORE][wasm] test fix-rc1 branch #74537
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [release/7.0] Fix FormattingHelpers.CountDigits(UInt128) and add more tests for Int128/UInt128.ToString #74536
  • [release/7.0] Backport workload changes from rc1 #74535
    area-Build-mono
  • CI: Tighten the path based triggers for jobs #74534
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add NuGet package for System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema #74533
    area-Serialization
  • Switch to unified fully managed Overlapped implementation #74532
    area-System.Threading
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Try to make tests faster2 #74530
  • Remove all non-functional/non-informational uses of mscorlib. #74529
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable caching of writeable W^X mappings #74526
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Don't re-use XmlSchemaSet - it's not threadsafe. #74524
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #74523
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move all build pools to -Svc equivalents (7.0 RC1) #74521
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Non-canonical NaN tests for Vector Equals method (Issue #68710) #74517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Bump branding to RC2 #74515
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #74512
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Prevent pooled byte buffer writer index from overflowing #74511
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • SourceBuild: pass portable argument via the build script arg. #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Forward-substitute long calls on 32 bit targets #74502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • corehost: align artifacts dir used by managed and native build. #74498
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • #50575 colorbehavior default should disable colors in android/applemobile #74496
    os-android, os-ios, area-Extensions-Logging, os-tvos
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74493
    area-System.IO
  • Working with StressLogAnalyzer I found yet another issue where we are… #74491
  • Update fabricbot.json for Tellurium team #74480
    area-Meta
  • fix MaxResponseHeadersLength tests #74479
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Only stack allocate when marshalling Utf8 arguments #74478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reuse shared invoker and throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net
  • Attempt to reduce test build cost #74471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] supporting `src/tests/run.sh` on LA64. #74470
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some erros when testing GCstress4. #74469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action

Merged

  • Fix FormattingHelpers.CountDigits(UInt128) and add more tests for Int128/UInt128.ToString #74501
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] improved interop perf test #74514
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle package #74445
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage (#74300) #74464
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #74481
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Remove assert from Http3Connection.SendAsync #74484
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0] Disable ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #74483
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74460
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix write barriers in NativeAOT #74455
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve windows hardware exception handling performance #74426
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Expose JsonSerializer.IsReadOnly and MakeReadOnly() APIs. #74431
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Revert "#50575 default case color behaviour is enabled" #74485
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74454
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74433
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Fix missing cross-origin headers when running the browser-eventpipe sample #74410
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Disable VerifyXmlResolver test. #74447
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix naming in interop code generation #74472
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74451
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] improve samples #74371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] simple perf tests for JavaScript interop #74419
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix symlink detection in tests #74462
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1][mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74453
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Backport tar bug fixes and improvements #74449
    area-System.IO

Updated

  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Move all the wasm jobs from runtime-staging to runtime #73596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74458
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing performance pipeline fix #74097
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Collect SPMI for TechEmpower benchmarks #74420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT][Build Error]One or more errors occurred. #1965

Updated

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: strategy for PRs for RyuJIT with optimisations on #1964

PullRequests

Updated

  • Test infrastructure integration #1963

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect translation for WorkloadUpdatesAvailable for some languages #27424
    7.0.1xx
  • Code that compiles on dotnet 6 gives compile errors on dotnet 7 preview #27403
  • Workload instalation doesn't respect rollback file #27402

Closed

  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure parameter names don't change #23908
  • Can not publish hosted Blazor Webassembly application. Space in path bug. #27404
  • web.config processPath is different when using --runtime argument with dotnet publish #27408

PullRequests

Created

  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • ApiCompat/AttributesMustMatch: add test case for attributes with array and type arguments #27431
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Move 7.0.1xx (sans eng/common) to -Svc build pools #27426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move non-eng-common builds to NetCore1ESPool-Svc-* version #27425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • emit diagnostic for adding sealed to interface member #27421
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • add rule to detect change in method parameter names #27380
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #27419
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Added support of C#11 to templates #27361
    Servicing-approved, Area-Templates, 7.0.1xx

Updated

  • dotnet new tests refactoring #27333
    area: dotnet new
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SourceText created in didOpen LSP handler needs encoding and checksum algorithm #63583
    Backlog
  • Report when input referenced by NotNullIfNotNull is never read #63582
  • Incorrect "Remove unnecessary suppression" message #63577
  • Investigate why new rename UI is causing completion tests to fail in CI #63576
  • Eliminate all uses of Workspace.TryApplyChanges from command handlers #63574
  • using statement declaration within switch ending in goto results in "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #63570
    17.4
  • Implicitly typed lambdas with `[UnscopedRef]` don't match their own anonymous delegate types #63565
  • Unclear stack state for unconditional branches #63564
  • C# Interactive Window should default to .NET Core if the current project targets it #63563
  • Weird pattern matching behavior #63560
  • string keyword is added by IntelliSense in error when specifying HtmlAttributes for LabelFor HTML Helper #63558
  • [LSP] Rename doesn't reject invalid identifiers #63556
  • Remove Lazy Handler requirement from Roslyn LSP #63555

Closed

  • IDE0031 should not report cases where method call is on static method and instance of same name as type is used in null check #63557
  • IDE0074 should not fire for cases where pattern can only be simplified when "preprocessor constant" defined #63552
  • IDE0074 should not fire on null coalescing assignment with function pointers #63551
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error (StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.) #63567
    17.4 P1
  • IndexOutOfRangeException from VisualBasic.Binder.ReportOverloadResolutionFailureForASingleCandidate #61193
    17.4
  • Last 13 characters of error output in 'C# Interactive' window are not colored red #63317
    17.4
  • Missing CS8166 when accessing [UnscopedRef] property to assing to an unscoped local #63526
  • Assert failure in Binder.CheckValue() compiling discarded ref assignment #63446
    17.4
  • Provide spell checker on comments/identifiers #24963
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63584
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets - Command Handler tests #63581
    Area-IDE
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • More sync command handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • Remove BranchId from the workspace. #63578
    Area-IDE
  • Remove waiting for background task from more command handlers #63571
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow ModuleInitializer attribute on abstract/virtual static methods. #63568
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • make roslyn solution default on unix #63566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Do not offer ?. if the rhs will be a static member #63573
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer 'use compound operator' if pp-directives are present #63572
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't support coalescing function pointers. #63569
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete extra character in Syntax.xml #63561
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Binder.CheckValue - adjust an assert for DiscardExpression to handle ref assignment. #63534
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, New Language Feature - Ref Reassignment, Next
  • CSharp.DeclarationTable – avoid realizing lazy roots during add/remove operations. #63517
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Upgrade LSP version #63341
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused extensions #63549
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't report an issue for predictable failures #63550
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #63553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Specify targets when loading MSBuildWorkspace #61391
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `launchUrl` and `launchBrowser` settings not respected #43531
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #43530
  • CORS policy per request #43526
  • ASP.NET Core 7.0 SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider is inconsistent #43524
  • Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43523
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to host an ASP Core .NET 6 application in a windows service? #43527
  • Blazor WASM web app doesn't work properly in Firefox #43516
  • Can't build docker image for ASP.NET Core + React #43514
  • [Blazor] Better diagnostics for Blazor server #43513
  • HubClientProxyGenerator doesn't run when using inferred generic type arguments #43510
  • Change disposed exceptions to use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #43503
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add HttpConnectAttribute #43501

Closed

  • Add AuthorizationPolicyCache #43227
    7.0-rc1
  • VS 2022 Stuck Launching Angular SPA and Never Redirects #43491
  • Blazor onmousedown get event target #43519
  • Blazor WASM ignores the Base Href when trying to fetch hot-reload script #39554
    7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] how to disable the [parameter] feature inherit from component? #43486
  • Migrating from asp.net core 3.1 LTS to 6.0 does not work #43517
  • Sessions - How to report / capture engagement information. #43137
    Discussions
  • [Question] Wrapping Blazor Input components in a custom component #43509
  • Suggestion for mixing Blazor Webassembly and Server #43508
  • jwt authentication not working on .net 6 #43504
  • Resource limit API review #32030
    .NET 7 Planning
  • "Reboot" button in setup after a repair does nothing #36857
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Move to -Svc pool provider (release/7.0) #43529
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43521
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [Blazor] Fix redirect to login #43520
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43518
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Fix linking issues #43515
    area-blazor
  • Add check and return Lockout Error after unsuccessful TwoFactor SignIn attempt #43512
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json #43497
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc2
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in Servers #43502
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Update test-configuration.json #43505
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [release/7.0-rc1] HTTP/3 flaky test retries and logging #43423
    area-runtime
  • Remove the double dispatch on Windows for IO #43449
    area-runtime
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    area-runtime
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1964510 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing mutations for ListView items #9640
  • Label content within VerticalStackLayout with WidthRequest Set overflows container on iOS #9639
  • Using a custom configuration to publish Android app #9627
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "microsoft.net.workload.emscripten.manifest-6.0.300.msi.x64::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9625
  • [Bug] Wrap UserControl (which Contains a WrapLayout) inside StackLayout raises Exception #9624
  • OpenGLView is not available #9623

Closed

  • Error running MAUI Blazor Application (.Net 6) using Xamarin.Firebase.Messaging #8233
  • What is the status of the .NET MAUI Docs? #8689
  • VerticalStackLayout Spacing with hidden children #9586
    .NET 7
  • Convert over additional non appcompat controls to appcompat #9323
    6.0-sr5
  • Custom control inheriting from Border doesn't update background on iOS using a trigger without stroke being set #9542
  • Border Background is not updating using VisualStateManager in iOS #9444
    6.0-servicing
  • Assembly 'Microsoft.Maui' with identity 'Microsoft.Maui, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=15.4.300.0 #8858
  • MAUI Workload version vs .Net SDK version #8828
  • 'clang++ exited with code 1' iOS build issue #9047
  • System.AccessViolationException when using SwipeView in a CollectionView on Windows - back again #9540
  • ContentView template has wrong namespace #9628
  • Give a possibility to disable overscroll in AppShell/ShellContent #6662
  • Border with shadows not working on iOS and Mac but works on Android and Windows #8452
    6.0-sr3
  • GraphicsView Select Path. #9451
  • Update Multi platform apps #9617
  • MAUI for Linux #9610

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add support to net7.0 for multi-targeting in VS #9643
  • [ci] Add support to net6.0 for multi-targeting in VS #9642
  • Display orientation should not use window size #9641
    7.0-rc1
  • [Android] Update RadioButton to get inline content view text #9633
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Android] Fire Completed event using ReturnType.Search #9632
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Load local images without extensions on Windows #9631
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:
  • [net6.0][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9620
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • [main][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9619
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9618
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Don't add space around collapsed children when measuring stack layouts #9616
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Fix updating Border Background using VisualStateManager #9553
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [net7.0] remove $(NoWarn) for AD0001 #9605
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border #8464
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589
    area/Xaml </>
  • Implement PointerGestureRecognizer #9592
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Windows message loop manager #9614
    platform/windows 🪟, area/lifecycle 🔁, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470
    area/layout 🔲
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Fix typo in ScrollToRequest.cs #9574
    community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0.0-preview.7.22376.2 / SQL Server / Migration Issue: The number of row value expressions in the INSERT statement exceeds the maximum allowed number of 1000 row values #28876
  • JSON: support for weakly typed json properties #28871
  • ## Owned Entity Collection Property Migration Error #28869
  • Migration Problem With ColumnType Set In Owned Entity #28868
  • Support parameterized queries in MigrationsBuilder.Sql #28867
  • Make existing model building conventions more extensible #28866
  • EF5 to EF6 getting 'Unable to translate set operation when matching columns on both sides have different store types.' #28865
  • [Question] How to build table metadata at runtime via migration API and generate DDL. #28864
  • Json: map non-primitive collections to JSON objects #28861

Closed

  • Invalid SQL query gets generated when checking for null in LINQ #27609
    7.0.0
  • Query: Avoid repeated visitation in SqlTranslator #28796
    7.0.0
  • Suffix original value sproc parameters by default #28817
    7.0.0
  • Prevent EF Core from generating foreign key #28853
  • Performance of queries: raw SQL vs EF #28746
  • Scaffold Not Building Entities With Correct Capitalization #28729
  • Tracking error on Update with two Many-To-One properties referencing the same entity #28666
  • Query produced by global filters leads to wrong result with optional navigation #28653
  • Use partial updates for JSON #28595
    7.0.0-rc1
  • False positive global query filter warning for owned entities #26900
    7.0.0
  • Global query filter warning raised for TPH entities #26216
    7.0.0
  • Cleanup exception message for bulk updates #28737
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix sproc TPH mapping #28875
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches (7.0 RC1) #28874
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #28873
  • Scaffolding: Avoid recompiling T4 templates #28872
  • Fix to #28845 - JSON: add support for partial update to update just a single scalar property, rather than entire entities #28862

Merged

  • Query: Don't simplify Case block when ElseResult exists #28870
    auto-merge
  • Query: Avoid repeated visitation of subquery in sql translator #28857
  • Suffix original value sproc parameters by default #28860
  • Fix to #28595 - Use partial updates for JSON #28844
  • Query: Fix issue with required navigation and query filters #28858
  • Query: Cleanup exception message about bulk updates #28859
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Use unmapped FKs for topological order when propagating store-generated values #28851

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Prevent System.Memory package downgrade in razor-compiler #14384
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #14365
  • Add razor-compiler patch to fix source-build bootstrap build #14379

  • Switch RC1 branch to use NetCore1ESPool-Svc #14376
  • Update to .NET MAUI 7 RC 1 baseline manifests #14368

Updated

  • Update Versions.Details.xml source-build metadata #14375
